# LeafProperty.ProcessorInfoAndFeatures.Features.DTES64 property

Gets a value representing the key to retrieve the property value.

64-bit DS Area. A value of true indicates the processor supports DS area using 64-bit layout.

Key Composition

* Leaf: ProcessorInfoAndFeatures
* Property: DTES64
* Unit: None

Return Value

Type: Boolean

```csharp
public static IPropertyKey DTES64 { get; }
```
